nodes.documentation:
Payment Channel between two parties that allows multiple deposits.
Once closed, there is a contest period which allows state updates.
nodes.name: STKChannel
close

nodes.documentation: @notice Function to close the payment channel without a signature.
nodes.name: closeWithoutSignature
updateClosedChannel

nodes.documentation: @notice After the timeout of the channel after closing has passed, can be called by either participant to withdraw funds.
nodes.name: settle
